summary: An architect's desire to speak with his wife from beyond the grave becomes an obsession with supernatural repercussions.
cast: Michael Keaton|Chandra West|Deborah Kara Unger|Ian McNeice|Sarah Strange|Nicholas Elia|Mike Dopud|Marsha Regis|Brad Sihvon|Mitchell Kosterman|L. Harvey Gold|Amber Rothwell|Suzanne Ristic|Keegan Connor Tracy|Miranda Frigon|Aaron Douglas|Anthony Harrison|Bruce Dawson|Benita Ha|Anastasia Corbett|Micki Maunsell|Ross Birchall|Peter Bryant|Bill Tarling|Chuck Walkinshaw|Colin Chapin|April Telek|Michale Ascher|Gardiner Millar
title: White noise: Mas allá
